  • Features include building, mining, trading, fuel management, overheating mechanics, and a shop system

Mega Miner Online is a collaborative mining adventure game where players dig deep underground to find valuable resources. The game features real-time multiplayer through MQTT brokers, allowing players to see and interact with each other in a shared procedurally generated world. Players can mine various ores, upgrade their equipment, trade resources, and build structures while managing fuel consumption and overheating. The game includes both desktop and mobile support with intuitive controls, a comprehensive shop system for upgrades and consumables, and persistent save functionality with cloud synchronization across devices.
